attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop Inheritance Tax. This speaks for itself. The death of a family member should not be a tax man's heaven. People pay Taxe's all there lives only to be Taxed after their death. THIS IS WRONG AND NEEDS TO BE STOPPED. It is their property and their god given right to give it to whomever they like. It is not the goverments money or property.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
